prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
Numerous disturbing issues are emerging from the alliance between activists and corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne. These activists are not only attempting to suppress a remarkable documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous professional who was unfairly blacklisted by these activists, but they also employed similar tactics with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. They disregarded parental input and instead allowed activists to review and approve the curriculum, which heavily promotes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretence of advocating for a supposedly marginalized group, these activists are willing to go to extreme lengths to achieve their goals, even if it means harming children. Those who refuse to conform are labelled homophobic or ignorant, yet when asked for scientific evidence, they resort to presenting flawed research and personal attacks.

A troubling pattern is emerging from the partnership between activists and corrupt politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne. Not only are these activists trying to censor a remarkable documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave professional who was wrongly targeted by them, but they also used similar strategies to influence the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. They ignored parental feedback and instead gave activists a platform to review and approve the curriculum, which strongly promotes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of supporting a supposedly vulnerable group, these activists are willing to go to great lengths to achieve their objectives, even if it means putting children at risk. Those who refuse to comply are labelled homophobic or uninformed, yet when challenged to provide scientific proof, they resort to presenting flawed data and personal attacks.

A disturbing trend is emerging from the alliance between corrupt politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne, and activists. In addition to attempting to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unfairly targeted, they employed similar tactics to sway the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. By disregarding parental input, they granted activists a platform to revise and endorse the curriculum, which heavily promotes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretext of advocating for a supposedly marginalized group, these activists will stop at nothing to achieve their goals, even if it means jeopardizing the well-being of children. Those who refuse to conform are labelled homophobic or misinformed, yet when pressed to provide empirical evidence, they resort to presenting flawed data and personal attacks.

A worrying pattern is unfolding as a result of the partnership between corrupt politicians, including Kathleen Wynne, and activists. Not only did they try to censor a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly attacked, but they also used similar strategies to influence the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. By ignoring parental feedback, they gave activists a voice to rewrite and endorse the curriculum, which strongly advocates for gender dysphoria and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of supporting a supposedly vulnerable group, these activists will go to great lengths to achieve their objectives, even if it puts children's well-being at risk. Those who refuse to comply are labelled homophobic or uninformed, yet when challenged to provide concrete evidence, they resort to presenting biased data and personal attacks.

By disregarding parental input, they granted activists the opportunity to revise and endorse the curriculum, which strongly promotes gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

As a result, activists have successfully implemented significant changes, promoting a curriculum focused on gender dysphoria and the ideologies of Ben Levin.

Under the pretext of safeguarding a vulnerable group, these activists will stop at nothing to achieve their goals, even if it jeopardizes children's welfare. Those who dissent from their views are labeled as homophobic or misinformed, yet when pressed to provide concrete evidence, they resort to relying on biased data and personal attacks.
